PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-00172013-01-31,  ,  ,  EC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the On-Road Vehicle and Engine Emission Regulations (On-Board Diagnostic Systems for Heavy-Duty Engines and Other Amendments)
PrecisRegulations amending the ON-ROAD VEHICLE AND ENGINE EMISSION REGULATIONS (ON-BOARD DIAGNOSTIC SYSTEMS FOR HEAVY-DUTY ENGINES AND OTHER AMENDMENTS) in order to (1) include a requirement that heavy duty engines used or intended to be used in heavy-duty vehicles be equipped with an on-board diagnostic system; and (2) make administrative changes to reduce administrative burden.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0008 Publication Date: 2013-02-13
AttachmentsAttachment
